attributes.action: Make LGBTQ+ history a part of the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s important and everyone should learn about it! Everyone should know about the injustice, and the reason LGBTQ+ have a month to celebrate and why we have our own flag to celebrate what we’ve gone through. Also people should realize that love is love and gender is gender and everyone is valid!
attributes.background: I want the Government to make sure LGBTQ+ history is a part of the school curriculum in history lessons so kids in the next generations can learn about the past and can learn too grow up and accept LGBTQ+ and what they’ve gone through.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303195
